title: Childcare Volunteer Program
description: Volunteer at the Child Care Project and work with infants and toddlers. Play with them, shower them with love & make memories of a lifetime.

title: Dental Elective Internship
description: Be a part of Dental Elective Internship project and work with professional dentists. Students joining in groups can also organize dental care camps.

title: Women Empowerment
description: Contribute to Women Empowerment in India and help them to be more independent, learn to communicate in English and be confident to earn a livelihood.

title: Street Children Volunteering
description: Street Children Program consists of taking informal education classes with the children, playing games with the children and introducing them to activity-based learning.

title: Work with Elephants
description: Feeding the elephant, Bathing them, Massage of elephant, cleaning the area, making bundles of hay, go for a walk with them and help mahouts in making chapattis

title: VOLUNTEER IN ORPHANAGE INDIA
description: Teach them Basic English & Mathematics, Help them in their school home work,Organize fun games for them & involve in extra activities like drawing, singing, dancing and other extra curricular activities, tell them about importation of sanitation and aid, help with work in kitchen like cooking and distribution of food.
